analyzed: de nas dbyangs yig dmar po de rnams sbrang ma dga' ba rgyas par rnam par bsgoms nas /

analyzed: rang gi sngags kyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis phyogs bcu bkang ste ji snyed mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med kyi gnas su song nas me rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du stobs kyis bzhag nas 'od zer gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi zhags pas legs par ske nas bcings
translated: Having filled the ten directions with a mass of light rays from one‚Äôs mantra, one should go to the place of the woman as much as one desires, and having placed her on the upper surface of the fire and wind ma·πá·∏çala by the power of one‚Äôs mantra, one should bind her well by the neck with a noose of the nature of light rays.

analyzed: nas / lcags kyu rnon pos chos 'byung nas phug ste mdun du yang dag par bkug nas thal mo sbyar te /

original: 'on kyang dri ma dang bcas pa'i mdog can no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dri ma dang bcas pa'i mdog can no //

original: de'i dbus su yi ge hr'i:de'i bar du bcug pa'i ming gi yi ge bsam par bya'o ;
analyzed: de'i dbus su yi ge hr'i:de'i bar du bcug pa'i ming gi yi ge bsam par bya'o ;

original: / de nas rang gi sngags kyi 'od zer las byung ba'i rab tu dmar zhing phra ba'i lcags kyu rab tu rnon po dang / padma'i sdong bu la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um gi 'od kyis steng du 'gro zhing bskul bas sbrang bu'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro bzhin pas /

analyzed: rang gi sna bug g-yas las gzhan pa'i cig shos kyi sgor byung ste /

original: lcag skyu de yis de'i ming gi yi ge 'gugs par gnas par byed cing /
analyzed: lcag skyu de yis de'i ming gi yi ge 'gugs par gnas par byed cing /
translated: That hook causes the syllable of the name to be drawn out.

original: sbrang de rnams kyis kyang dga' bas padma de phyung zhing /
analyzed: sbrang de rnams kyis kyang dga' bas padma de phyung zhing /

analyzed: rang dags dum bur byed cing dbyangs yid rnams gzhib bar bya'o //

analyzed: zhes yun ring du mi g-yo bar blta bar bya'o //

original: de nas de kho na bzhin dbugs kyis bskul ba'i lcags kyus de'i ming stobs kyis blangs te /
analyzed: de nas de kho na bzhin dbugs kyis bskul ba'i lcags kyus de'i ming stobs kyis blangs te /

original: sbrang bu de rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: sbrang bu de rnams kyis kyang /

analyzed: rang gi dbyangs yig bkug ste /

original: de nas de'i nu ma la autpal la dmar po'i mde'u rnon po dang ldan pa'i mdas phug nas 'dod chags chen pos brgyal par gyur bar bltas nas lcags sgrog lta bu'i gzhus de'i rkang pa gnyis dam par bcings nas /

analyzed: rang gis bsnams pa'i autpa la'i sdong bu'i rang bzhin gyi zhags pas ske nas bcings te /

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par byas la /
analyzed: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par byas la /

original: ral gris 'jigs par bya ste /
analyzed: ral gris 'jigs par bya ste /

original: skyabs gzhan med par byas nas yang rang nyid ji ltar gnas pas skra grol ba shin tu 'dod chags kyis myos pa gcer bu gos med pa /

analyzed: mi sbyor bas 'jigs shing shin tu chags par gyur pa me long la brtan par byas nas rang rig pas rjes su chags par bya'o //

original: aom hr'i:aa mu kim a'a karsha ya manydzu sha hr'i:dza:zhes bya ba'i rang gi sngags kyi ming dang bcas pa rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom hr'i:aa mu kim a'a karsha ya manydzu sha hr'i:dza:zhes bya ba'i rang gi sngags kyi ming dang bcas pa rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra ‚ÄúO·πÉ hrƒ´·∏•! I summon such-and-such a woman, O Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ hrƒ´·∏• ja·∏•!‚Äù with one‚Äôs own name, with a one-pointed mind.

original: de ltar gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de ltar gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig nas brtsams te /

translated: When she comes, one should enjoy her as one likes, with the intention of worshipping one‚Äôs deity for the sake of the attainment of the great seal.

original: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The means of accomplishing Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the vajra without limbs, is complete.

analyzed: khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong dharma k'irtis bsgyur ba'o//
